name: ITBot Slack command - Create Solarwinds Incident
description:
1. We want to have the ability to create the SolarWinds ticket from Slack via a Slash command

2. The slash command includes the following parameters -

**Input following values:**
-  Title (free text field to enter a description of what I supported)
-   Sub-Category (picklist of NetSuite/Salesforce/Workato)
-   Time Spent (free text field for the time spent on the ticket, should be in minutes.
-   Time Spent description (This is basically to record on SolarWinds on what someone has actually spent time on)
-   Status - In Progress / Closed

**Hard-Coded Values:**
-  Description of the ticket - Looks like its not a required field in Solarwinds UI, we could remove this, maybe?
-   Category - Applications
-   Assigned To - slack command creator
-   Priority - Low
-   Department - Business Applications

_Return_ a confirmation or an error message based on the status of the ticket creation back in Slack.

code.name: bot_command_v2
code.description: New Solarwinds create ticket command to Slack Workbot

input.name: create
input.parameters:
[
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Title",
    "name": "Title",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "sample": "Resolve the issue related to sales order SO-353453"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "select",
    "label": "Sub-category",
    "name": "SubCategory",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "dialog_data_source": "custom",
    "options": "NetSuite, Salesforce, Workato"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Time spent",
    "parse_output": "integer_conversion",
    "name": "TimeSpent",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "hint": "Minutes spent on this incident, must be an integer value",
    "sample": "Input \"120\", for 2hrs"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text-area",
    "label": "Time spent description",
    "name": "TimeSpentDescription",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "select",
    "label": "Status",
    "name": "Status",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "dialog_data_source": "custom",
    "options": "In Progress, Closed"
  }
]

properties.label: Title
properties.name: title
properties.sample: Resolve the issue related to sales order SO-353453

properties.label: Time spent
properties.name: timespent
properties.hint: Minutes spent on this incident, must be an integer value

properties.label: state
properties.name: state
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.
